posts.post_content:
I am looking for from harder (think sovereign - old mill, etc) to rare backs (think broadleaf, lenox, drum, uzit) in lower to mid grade with good eye appeal.  I need the following fronts:

Leach bending over (anyone have a UZIT?)
Leach Portrait
Willis Portrait
Clarke portrait
Clarke batting
Camnitz arms folded
Abbatichio brown sleeves
Abstein
Phillips
Leiifield pitching
Leifield batting (Drum, UZIT or Lenox brown preferably?)
Gibson
Wilson

Let me know what you've got.
